concept.definition: The participant is the patient under evaluation
The participant is a practitioner involved in the patient's care
The participant is a person related to the patient

description: The type of participant for the action
name: PlanActionParticipantType

text.div:
PlanActionParticipantType

The type of participant for the action

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/action-participant-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
patient PatientThe participant is the patient under evaluation
practitioner PractitionerThe participant is a practitioner involved in the patient's care
related-person Related PersonThe participant is a person related to the patient
